scripts.clasp:deploy: node -e "const d=new Date();const p=n=>String(n).padStart(2,'0');const ts=\`${d.getFullYear()}-\${p(d.getMonth()+1)}-\${p(d.getDate())} \${p(d.getHours())}:\${p(d.getMinutes())}\`;const desc=process.env.npm_config_desc||`Auto deploy ${ts}`;console.log('Deploy desc:',desc);const {spawnSync}=require('child_process');process.exit((spawnSync('clasp',['deploy','-d',desc],{stdio:'inherit'}).status)||0);"
scripts.test: node -e "console.log('No automated tests configured. Use the Debug menu in Sheets or run: npm run test:clasp')"
